barāatun mina al-lahi warasūlihi ilā alladhīna ʿāhadttum mina al-mush'rikīna
fasīḥū fī al-arḍi arbaʿata ashhurin wa-iʿ'lamū annakum ghayru muʿ'jizī al-lahi wa-anna al-laha mukh'zī al-kāfirīna

wa-adhānun mina al-lahi warasūlihi ilā al-nāsi yawma al-ḥaji al-akbari anna al-laha barīon mina al-mush'rikīna warasūluhu fa-in tub'tum fahuwa khayrun lakum wa-in tawallaytum fa-iʿ'lamū annakum ghayru muʿ'jizī al-lahi wabashiri alladhīna kafarū biʿadhābin alīmin
illā alladhīna ʿāhadttum mina al-mush'rikīna thumma lam yanquṣūkum shayan walam yuẓāhirū ʿalaykum aḥadan fa-atimmū ilayhim ʿahdahum ilā muddatihim inna al-laha yuḥibbu al-mutaqīna

fa-idhā insalakha al-ashhuru al-ḥurumu fa-uq'tulū al-mush'rikīna ḥaythu wajadttumūhum wakhudhūhum wa-uḥ'ṣurūhum wa-uq'ʿudū lahum kulla marṣadin fa-in tābū wa-aqāmū al-ṣalata waātawū al-zakata fakhallū sabīlahum inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
wa-in aḥadun mina al-mush'rikīna is'tajāraka fa-ajir'hu ḥattā yasmaʿa kalāma al-lahi thumma abligh'hu mamanahu dhālika bi-annahum qawmun lā yaʿlamūna
kayfa yakūnu lil'mush'rikīna ʿahdun ʿinda al-lahi waʿinda rasūlihi illā alladhīna ʿāhadttum ʿinda al-masjidi al-ḥarāmi famā is'taqāmū lakum fa-is'taqīmū lahum inna al-laha yuḥibbu al-mutaqīna
kayfa wa-in yaẓharū ʿalaykum lā yarqubū fīkum illan walā dhimmatan yur'ḍūnakum bi-afwāhihim watabā qulūbuhum wa-aktharuhum fāsiqūna
ish'taraw biāyāti al-lahi thamanan qalīlan faṣaddū ʿan sabīlihi innahum sāa mā kānū yaʿmalūna
lā yarqubūna fī mu'minin illan walā dhimmatan wa-ulāika humu al-muʿ'tadūna
fa-in tābū wa-aqāmū al-ṣalata waātawū al-zakata fa-ikh'wānukum fī al-dīni wanufaṣṣilu al-āyāti liqawmin yaʿlamūna
wa-in nakathū aymānahum min baʿdi ʿahdihim waṭaʿanū fī dīnikum faqātilū a-immata al-kuf'ri innahum lā aymāna lahum laʿallahum yantahūna
alā tuqātilūna qawman nakathū aymānahum wahammū bi-ikh'rāji al-rasūli wahum badaūkum awwala marratin atakhshawnahum fal-lahu aḥaqqu an takhshawhu in kuntum mu'minīna
qātilūhum yuʿadhib'humu al-lahu bi-aydīkum wayukh'zihim wayanṣur'kum ʿalayhim wayashfi ṣudūra qawmin mu'minīna
wayudh'hib ghayẓa qulūbihim wayatūbu al-lahu ʿalā man yashāu wal-lahu ʿalīmun ḥakīmun
am ḥasib'tum an tut'rakū walammā yaʿlami al-lahu alladhīna jāhadū minkum walam yattakhidhū min dūni al-lahi walā rasūlihi walā al-mu'minīna walījatan wal-lahu khabīrun bimā taʿmalūna
mā kāna lil'mush'rikīna an yaʿmurū masājida al-lahi shāhidīna ʿalā anfusihim bil-kuf'ri ulāika ḥabiṭat aʿmāluhum wafī al-nāri hum khālidūna
innamā yaʿmuru masājida al-lahi man āmana bil-lahi wal-yawmi al-ākhiri wa-aqāma al-ṣalata waātā al-zakata walam yakhsha illā al-laha faʿasā ulāika an yakūnū mina al-muh'tadīna
ajaʿaltum siqāyata al-ḥāji waʿimārata al-masjidi al-ḥarāmi kaman āmana bil-lahi wal-yawmi al-ākhiri wajāhada fī sabīli al-lahi lā yastawūna ʿinda al-lahi wal-lahu lā yahdī al-qawma al-ẓālimīna
alladhīna āmanū wahājarū wajāhadū fī sabīli al-lahi bi-amwālihim wa-anfusihim aʿẓamu darajatan ʿinda al-lahi wa-ulāika humu al-fāizūna
yubashiruhum rabbuhum biraḥmatin min'hu wariḍ'wānin wajannātin lahum fīhā naʿīmun muqīmun
khālidīna fīhā abadan inna al-laha ʿindahu ajrun ʿaẓīmun
yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū lā tattakhidhū ābāakum wa-ikh'wānakum awliyāa ini is'taḥabbū al-kuf'ra ʿalā al-īmāni waman yatawallahum minkum fa-ulāika humu al-ẓālimūna

qul in kāna ābāukum wa-abnāukum wa-ikh'wānukum wa-azwājukum waʿashīratukum wa-amwālun iq'taraftumūhā watijāratun takhshawna kasādahā wamasākinu tarḍawnahā aḥabba ilaykum mina al-lahi warasūlihi wajihādin fī sabīlihi fatarabbaṣū ḥattā yatiya al-lahu bi-amrihi wal-lahu lā yahdī al-qawma al-fāsiqīna
laqad naṣarakumu al-lahu fī mawāṭina kathīratin wayawma ḥunaynin idh aʿjabatkum kathratukum falam tugh'ni ʿankum shayan waḍāqat ʿalaykumu al-arḍu bimā raḥubat thumma wallaytum mud'birīna
thumma anzala al-lahu sakīnatahu ʿalā rasūlihi waʿalā al-mu'minīna wa-anzala junūdan lam tarawhā waʿadhaba alladhīna kafarū wadhālika jazāu al-kāfirīna
thumma yatūbu al-lahu min baʿdi dhālika ʿalā man yashāu wal-lahu ghafūrun raḥīmun

yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū innamā al-mush'rikūna najasun falā yaqrabū al-masjida al-ḥarāma baʿda ʿāmihim hādhā wa-in khif'tum ʿaylatan fasawfa yugh'nīkumu al-lahu min faḍlihi in shāa inna al-laha ʿalīmun ḥakīmun

qātilū alladhīna lā yu'minūna bil-lahi walā bil-yawmi al-ākhiri walā yuḥarrimūna mā ḥarrama al-lahu warasūluhu walā yadīnūna dīna al-ḥaqi mina alladhīna ūtū al-kitāba ḥattā yuʿ'ṭū al-jiz'yata ʿan yadin wahum ṣāghirūna
waqālati al-yahūdu ʿuzayrun ub'nu al-lahi waqālati al-naṣārā al-masīḥu ub'nu al-lahi dhālika qawluhum bi-afwāhihim yuḍāhiūna qawla alladhīna kafarū min qablu qātalahumu al-lahu annā yu'fakūna
ittakhadhū aḥbārahum waruh'bānahum arbāban min dūni al-lahi wal-masīḥa ib'na maryama wamā umirū illā liyaʿbudū ilāhan wāḥidan lā ilāha illā huwa sub'ḥānahu ʿammā yush'rikūna
yurīdūna an yuṭ'fiū nūra al-lahi bi-afwāhihim wayabā al-lahu illā an yutimma nūrahu walaw kariha al-kāfirūna
huwa alladhī arsala rasūlahu bil-hudā wadīni al-ḥaqi liyuẓ'hirahu ʿalā al-dīni kullihi walaw kariha al-mush'rikūna

yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū inna kathīran mina al-aḥbāri wal-ruh'bāni layakulūna amwāla al-nāsi bil-bāṭili wayaṣuddūna ʿan sabīli al-lahi wa-alladhīna yaknizūna al-dhahaba wal-fiḍata walā yunfiqūnahā fī sabīli al-lahi fabashir'hum biʿadhābin alīmin
yawma yuḥ'mā ʿalayhā fī nāri jahannama fatuk'wā bihā jibāhuhum wajunūbuhum waẓuhūruhum hādhā mā kanaztum li-anfusikum fadhūqū mā kuntum taknizūna

inna ʿiddata al-shuhūri ʿinda al-lahi ith'nā ʿashara shahran fī kitābi al-lahi yawma khalaqa al-samāwāti wal-arḍa min'hā arbaʿatun ḥurumun dhālika al-dīnu al-qayimu falā taẓlimū fīhinna anfusakum waqātilū al-mush'rikīna kāffatan kamā yuqātilūnakum kāffatan wa-iʿ'lamū anna al-laha maʿa al-mutaqīna

innamā al-nasīu ziyādatun fī al-kuf'ri yuḍallu bihi alladhīna kafarū yuḥillūnahu ʿāman wayuḥarrimūnahu ʿāman liyuwāṭiū ʿiddata mā ḥarrama al-lahu fayuḥillū mā ḥarrama al-lahu zuyyina lahum sūu aʿmālihim wal-lahu lā yahdī al-qawma al-kāfirīna

yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū mā lakum idhā qīla lakumu infirū fī sabīli al-lahi ithāqaltum ilā al-arḍi araḍītum bil-ḥayati al-dun'yā mina al-ākhirati famā matāʿu al-ḥayati al-dun'yā fī al-ākhirati illā qalīlun
illā tanfirū yuʿadhib'kum ʿadhāban alīman wayastabdil qawman ghayrakum walā taḍurrūhu shayan wal-lahu ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun

illā tanṣurūhu faqad naṣarahu al-lahu idh akhrajahu alladhīna kafarū thāniya ith'nayni idh humā fī al-ghāri idh yaqūlu liṣāḥibihi lā taḥzan inna al-laha maʿanā fa-anzala al-lahu sakīnatahu ʿalayhi wa-ayyadahu bijunūdin lam tarawhā wajaʿala kalimata alladhīna kafarū al-suf'lā wakalimatu al-lahi hiya al-ʿul'yā wal-lahu ʿazīzun ḥakīmun
infirū khifāfan wathiqālan wajāhidū bi-amwālikum wa-anfusikum fī sabīli al-lahi dhālikum khayrun lakum in kuntum taʿlamūna

law kāna ʿaraḍan qarīban wasafaran qāṣidan la-ittabaʿūka walākin baʿudat ʿalayhimu al-shuqatu wasayaḥlifūna bil-lahi lawi is'taṭaʿnā lakharajnā maʿakum yuh'likūna anfusahum wal-lahu yaʿlamu innahum lakādhibūna
ʿafā al-lahu ʿanka lima adhinta lahum ḥattā yatabayyana laka alladhīna ṣadaqū wataʿlama al-kādhibīna
lā yastadhinuka alladhīna yu'minūna bil-lahi wal-yawmi al-ākhiri an yujāhidū bi-amwālihim wa-anfusihim wal-lahu ʿalīmun bil-mutaqīna
innamā yastadhinuka alladhīna lā yu'minūna bil-lahi wal-yawmi al-ākhiri wa-ir'tābat qulūbuhum fahum fī raybihim yataraddadūna
walaw arādū al-khurūja la-aʿaddū lahu ʿuddatan walākin kariha al-lahu inbiʿāthahum fathabbaṭahum waqīla uq'ʿudū maʿa al-qāʿidīna
law kharajū fīkum mā zādūkum illā khabālan wala-awḍaʿū khilālakum yabghūnakumu al-fit'nata wafīkum sammāʿūna lahum wal-lahu ʿalīmun bil-ẓālimīna
laqadi ib'taghawū al-fit'nata min qablu waqallabū laka al-umūra ḥattā jāa al-ḥaqu waẓahara amru al-lahi wahum kārihūna
wamin'hum man yaqūlu i'dhan lī walā taftinnī alā fī al-fit'nati saqaṭū wa-inna jahannama lamuḥīṭatun bil-kāfirīna
in tuṣib'ka ḥasanatun tasu'hum wa-in tuṣib'ka muṣībatun yaqūlū qad akhadhnā amranā min qablu wayatawallaw wahum fariḥūna
qul lan yuṣībanā illā mā kataba al-lahu lanā huwa mawlānā waʿalā al-lahi falyatawakkali al-mu'minūna
qul hal tarabbaṣūna binā illā iḥ'dā al-ḥus'nayayni wanaḥnu natarabbaṣu bikum an yuṣībakumu al-lahu biʿadhābin min ʿindihi aw bi-aydīnā fatarabbaṣū innā maʿakum mutarabbiṣūna
qul anfiqū ṭawʿan aw karhan lan yutaqabbala minkum innakum kuntum qawman fāsiqīna
wamā manaʿahum an tuq'bala min'hum nafaqātuhum illā annahum kafarū bil-lahi wabirasūlihi walā yatūna al-ṣalata illā wahum kusālā walā yunfiqūna illā wahum kārihūna
falā tuʿ'jib'ka amwāluhum walā awlāduhum innamā yurīdu al-lahu liyuʿadhibahum bihā fī al-ḥayati al-dun'yā watazhaqa anfusuhum wahum kāfirūna
wayaḥlifūna bil-lahi innahum laminkum wamā hum minkum walākinnahum qawmun yafraqūna
law yajidūna malja-an aw maghārātin aw muddakhalan lawallaw ilayhi wahum yajmaḥūna
wamin'hum man yalmizuka fī al-ṣadaqāti fa-in uʿ'ṭū min'hā raḍū wa-in lam yuʿ'ṭaw min'hā idhā hum yaskhaṭūna
walaw annahum raḍū mā ātāhumu al-lahu warasūluhu waqālū ḥasbunā al-lahu sayu'tīnā al-lahu min faḍlihi warasūluhu innā ilā al-lahi rāghibūna

innamā al-ṣadaqātu lil'fuqarāi wal-masākīni wal-ʿāmilīna ʿalayhā wal-mu-alafati qulūbuhum wafī al-riqābi wal-ghārimīna wafī sabīli al-lahi wa-ib'ni al-sabīli farīḍatan mina al-lahi wal-lahu ʿalīmun ḥakīmun

wamin'humu alladhīna yu'dhūna al-nabiya wayaqūlūna huwa udhunun qul udhunu khayrin lakum yu'minu bil-lahi wayu'minu lil'mu'minīna waraḥmatun lilladhīna āmanū minkum wa-alladhīna yu'dhūna rasūla al-lahi lahum ʿadhābun alīmun
yaḥlifūna bil-lahi lakum liyur'ḍūkum wal-lahu warasūluhu aḥaqqu an yur'ḍūhu in kānū mu'minīna
alam yaʿlamū annahu man yuḥādidi al-laha warasūlahu fa-anna lahu nāra jahannama khālidan fīhā dhālika al-khiz'yu al-ʿaẓīmu
yaḥdharu al-munāfiqūna an tunazzala ʿalayhim sūratun tunabbi-uhum bimā fī qulūbihim quli is'tahziū inna al-laha mukh'rijun mā taḥdharūna
wala-in sa-altahum layaqūlunna innamā kunnā nakhūḍu wanalʿabu qul abil-lahi waāyātihi warasūlihi kuntum tastahziūna
lā taʿtadhirū qad kafartum baʿda īmānikum in naʿfu ʿan ṭāifatin minkum nuʿadhib ṭāifatan bi-annahum kānū muj'rimīna
al-munāfiqūna wal-munāfiqātu baʿḍuhum min baʿḍin yamurūna bil-munkari wayanhawna ʿani al-maʿrūfi wayaqbiḍūna aydiyahum nasū al-laha fanasiyahum inna al-munāfiqīna humu al-fāsiqūna
waʿada al-lahu al-munāfiqīna wal-munāfiqāti wal-kufāra nāra jahannama khālidīna fīhā hiya ḥasbuhum walaʿanahumu al-lahu walahum ʿadhābun muqīmun

ka-alladhīna min qablikum kānū ashadda minkum quwwatan wa-akthara amwālan wa-awlādan fa-is'tamtaʿū bikhalāqihim fa-is'tamtaʿtum bikhalāqikum kamā is'tamtaʿa alladhīna min qablikum bikhalāqihim wakhuḍ'tum ka-alladhī khāḍū ulāika ḥabiṭat aʿmāluhum fī al-dun'yā wal-ākhirati wa-ulāika humu al-khāsirūna

alam yatihim naba-u alladhīna min qablihim qawmi nūḥin waʿādin wathamūda waqawmi ib'rāhīma wa-aṣḥābi madyana wal-mu'tafikāti atathum rusuluhum bil-bayināti famā kāna al-lahu liyaẓlimahum walākin kānū anfusahum yaẓlimūna

wal-mu'minūna wal-mu'minātu baʿḍuhum awliyāu baʿḍin yamurūna bil-maʿrūfi wayanhawna ʿani al-munkari wayuqīmūna al-ṣalata wayu'tūna al-zakata wayuṭīʿūna al-laha warasūlahu ulāika sayarḥamuhumu al-lahu inna al-laha ʿazīzun ḥakīmun
waʿada al-lahu al-mu'minīna wal-mu'mināti jannātin tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru khālidīna fīhā wamasākina ṭayyibatan fī jannāti ʿadnin wariḍ'wānun mina al-lahi akbaru dhālika huwa al-fawzu al-ʿaẓīmu
yāayyuhā al-nabiyu jāhidi al-kufāra wal-munāfiqīna wa-ugh'luẓ ʿalayhim wamawāhum jahannamu wabi'sa al-maṣīru

yaḥlifūna bil-lahi mā qālū walaqad qālū kalimata al-kuf'ri wakafarū baʿda is'lāmihim wahammū bimā lam yanālū wamā naqamū illā an aghnāhumu al-lahu warasūluhu min faḍlihi fa-in yatūbū yaku khayran lahum wa-in yatawallaw yuʿadhib'humu al-lahu ʿadhāban alīman fī al-dun'yā wal-ākhirati wamā lahum fī al-arḍi min waliyyin walā naṣīrin
wamin'hum man ʿāhada al-laha la-in ātānā min faḍlihi lanaṣṣaddaqanna walanakūnanna mina al-ṣāliḥīna
falammā ātāhum min faḍlihi bakhilū bihi watawallaw wahum muʿ'riḍūna
fa-aʿqabahum nifāqan fī qulūbihim ilā yawmi yalqawnahu bimā akhlafū al-laha mā waʿadūhu wabimā kānū yakdhibūna
alam yaʿlamū anna al-laha yaʿlamu sirrahum wanajwāhum wa-anna al-laha ʿallāmu al-ghuyūbi
alladhīna yalmizūna al-muṭawiʿīna mina al-mu'minīna fī al-ṣadaqāti wa-alladhīna lā yajidūna illā juh'dahum fayaskharūna min'hum sakhira al-lahu min'hum walahum ʿadhābun alīmun
is'taghfir lahum aw lā tastaghfir lahum in tastaghfir lahum sabʿīna marratan falan yaghfira al-lahu lahum dhālika bi-annahum kafarū bil-lahi warasūlihi wal-lahu lā yahdī al-qawma al-fāsiqīna

fariḥa al-mukhalafūna bimaqʿadihim khilāfa rasūli al-lahi wakarihū an yujāhidū bi-amwālihim wa-anfusihim fī sabīli al-lahi waqālū lā tanfirū fī al-ḥari qul nāru jahannama ashaddu ḥarran law kānū yafqahūna
falyaḍḥakū qalīlan walyabkū kathīran jazāan bimā kānū yaksibūna

fa-in rajaʿaka al-lahu ilā ṭāifatin min'hum fa-is'tadhanūka lil'khurūji faqul lan takhrujū maʿiya abadan walan tuqātilū maʿiya ʿaduwwan innakum raḍītum bil-quʿūdi awwala marratin fa-uq'ʿudū maʿa al-khālifīna
walā tuṣalli ʿalā aḥadin min'hum māta abadan walā taqum ʿalā qabrihi innahum kafarū bil-lahi warasūlihi wamātū wahum fāsiqūna
walā tuʿ'jib'ka amwāluhum wa-awlāduhum innamā yurīdu al-lahu an yuʿadhibahum bihā fī al-dun'yā watazhaqa anfusuhum wahum kāfirūna
wa-idhā unzilat sūratun an āminū bil-lahi wajāhidū maʿa rasūlihi is'tadhanaka ulū al-ṭawli min'hum waqālū dharnā nakun maʿa al-qāʿidīna
raḍū bi-an yakūnū maʿa al-khawālifi waṭubiʿa ʿalā qulūbihim fahum lā yafqahūna
lākini al-rasūlu wa-alladhīna āmanū maʿahu jāhadū bi-amwālihim wa-anfusihim wa-ulāika lahumu al-khayrātu wa-ulāika humu al-muf'liḥūna
aʿadda al-lahu lahum jannātin tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru khālidīna fīhā dhālika al-fawzu al-ʿaẓīmu
wajāa al-muʿadhirūna mina al-aʿrābi liyu'dhana lahum waqaʿada alladhīna kadhabū al-laha warasūlahu sayuṣību alladhīna kafarū min'hum ʿadhābun alīmun
laysa ʿalā al-ḍuʿafāi walā ʿalā al-marḍā walā ʿalā alladhīna lā yajidūna mā yunfiqūna ḥarajun idhā naṣaḥū lillahi warasūlihi mā ʿalā al-muḥ'sinīna min sabīlin wal-lahu ghafūrun raḥīmun
walā ʿalā alladhīna idhā mā atawka litaḥmilahum qul'ta lā ajidu mā aḥmilukum ʿalayhi tawallaw wa-aʿyunuhum tafīḍu mina al-damʿi ḥazanan allā yajidū mā yunfiqūna
innamā al-sabīlu ʿalā alladhīna yastadhinūnaka wahum aghniyāu raḍū bi-an yakūnū maʿa al-khawālifi waṭabaʿa al-lahu ʿalā qulūbihim fahum lā yaʿlamūna

yaʿtadhirūna ilaykum idhā rajaʿtum ilayhim qul lā taʿtadhirū lan nu'mina lakum qad nabba-anā al-lahu min akhbārikum wasayarā al-lahu ʿamalakum warasūluhu thumma turaddūna ilā ʿālimi al-ghaybi wal-shahādati fayunabbi-ukum bimā kuntum taʿmalūna
sayaḥlifūna bil-lahi lakum idhā inqalabtum ilayhim lituʿ'riḍū ʿanhum fa-aʿriḍū ʿanhum innahum rij'sun wamawāhum jahannamu jazāan bimā kānū yaksibūna
yaḥlifūna lakum litarḍaw ʿanhum fa-in tarḍaw ʿanhum fa-inna al-laha lā yarḍā ʿani al-qawmi al-fāsiqīna
al-aʿrābu ashaddu kuf'ran wanifāqan wa-ajdaru allā yaʿlamū ḥudūda mā anzala al-lahu ʿalā rasūlihi wal-lahu ʿalīmun ḥakīmun
wamina al-aʿrābi man yattakhidhu mā yunfiqu maghraman wayatarabbaṣu bikumu al-dawāira ʿalayhim dāiratu al-sawi wal-lahu samīʿun ʿalīmun

wamina al-aʿrābi man yu'minu bil-lahi wal-yawmi al-ākhiri wayattakhidhu mā yunfiqu qurubātin ʿinda al-lahi waṣalawāti al-rasūli alā innahā qur'batun lahum sayud'khiluhumu al-lahu fī raḥmatihi inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun

wal-sābiqūna al-awalūna mina al-muhājirīna wal-anṣāri wa-alladhīna ittabaʿūhum bi-iḥ'sānin raḍiya al-lahu ʿanhum waraḍū ʿanhu wa-aʿadda lahum jannātin tajrī taḥtahā al-anhāru khālidīna fīhā abadan dhālika al-fawzu al-ʿaẓīmu
wamimman ḥawlakum mina al-aʿrābi munāfiqūna wamin ahli al-madīnati maradū ʿalā al-nifāqi lā taʿlamuhum naḥnu naʿlamuhum sanuʿadhibuhum marratayni thumma yuraddūna ilā ʿadhābin ʿaẓīmin
waākharūna iʿ'tarafū bidhunūbihim khalaṭū ʿamalan ṣāliḥan waākhara sayyi-an ʿasā al-lahu an yatūba ʿalayhim inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
khudh min amwālihim ṣadaqatan tuṭahhiruhum watuzakkīhim bihā waṣalli ʿalayhim inna ṣalataka sakanun lahum wal-lahu samīʿun ʿalīmun
alam yaʿlamū anna al-laha huwa yaqbalu al-tawbata ʿan ʿibādihi wayakhudhu al-ṣadaqāti wa-anna al-laha huwa al-tawābu al-raḥīmu
waquli iʿ'malū fasayarā al-lahu ʿamalakum warasūluhu wal-mu'minūna wasaturaddūna ilā ʿālimi al-ghaybi wal-shahādati fayunabbi-ukum bimā kuntum taʿmalūna
waākharūna mur'jawna li-amri al-lahi immā yuʿadhibuhum wa-immā yatūbu ʿalayhim wal-lahu ʿalīmun ḥakīmun

wa-alladhīna ittakhadhū masjidan ḍirāran wakuf'ran watafrīqan bayna al-mu'minīna wa-ir'ṣādan liman ḥāraba al-laha warasūlahu min qablu walayaḥlifunna in aradnā illā al-ḥus'nā wal-lahu yashhadu innahum lakādhibūna
lā taqum fīhi abadan lamasjidun ussisa ʿalā al-taqwā min awwali yawmin aḥaqqu an taqūma fīhi fīhi rijālun yuḥibbūna an yataṭahharū wal-lahu yuḥibbu al-muṭahirīna
afaman assasa bun'yānahu ʿalā taqwā mina al-lahi wariḍ'wānin khayrun am man assasa bun'yānahu ʿalā shafā jurufin hārin fa-in'hāra bihi fī nāri jahannama wal-lahu lā yahdī al-qawma al-ẓālimīna
lā yazālu bun'yānuhumu alladhī banaw rībatan fī qulūbihim illā an taqaṭṭaʿa qulūbuhum wal-lahu ʿalīmun ḥakīmun

inna al-laha ish'tarā mina al-mu'minīna anfusahum wa-amwālahum bi-anna lahumu al-janata yuqātilūna fī sabīli al-lahi fayaqtulūna wayuq'talūna waʿdan ʿalayhi ḥaqqan fī al-tawrāti wal-injīli wal-qur'āni waman awfā biʿahdihi mina al-lahi fa-is'tabshirū bibayʿikumu alladhī bāyaʿtum bihi wadhālika huwa al-fawzu al-ʿaẓīmu
al-tāibūna al-ʿābidūna al-ḥāmidūna al-sāiḥūna al-rākiʿūna al-sājidūna al-āmirūna bil-maʿrūfi wal-nāhūna ʿani al-munkari wal-ḥāfiẓūna liḥudūdi al-lahi wabashiri al-mu'minīna
mā kāna lilnnabiyyi wa-alladhīna āmanū an yastaghfirū lil'mush'rikīna walaw kānū ulī qur'bā min baʿdi mā tabayyana lahum annahum aṣḥābu al-jaḥīmi
wamā kāna is'tigh'fāru ib'rāhīma li-abīhi illā ʿan mawʿidatin waʿadahā iyyāhu falammā tabayyana lahu annahu ʿaduwwun lillahi tabarra-a min'hu inna ib'rāhīma la-awwāhun ḥalīmun
wamā kāna al-lahu liyuḍilla qawman baʿda idh hadāhum ḥattā yubayyina lahum mā yattaqūna inna al-laha bikulli shayin ʿalīmun
inna al-laha lahu mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi yuḥ'yī wayumītu wamā lakum min dūni al-lahi min waliyyin walā naṣīrin

laqad tāba al-lahu ʿalā al-nabiyi wal-muhājirīna wal-anṣāri alladhīna ittabaʿūhu fī sāʿati al-ʿus'rati min baʿdi mā kāda yazīghu qulūbu farīqin min'hum thumma tāba ʿalayhim innahu bihim raūfun raḥīmun

waʿalā al-thalāthati alladhīna khullifū ḥattā idhā ḍāqat ʿalayhimu al-arḍu bimā raḥubat waḍāqat ʿalayhim anfusuhum waẓannū an lā malja-a mina al-lahi illā ilayhi thumma tāba ʿalayhim liyatūbū inna al-laha huwa al-tawābu al-raḥīmu
yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū ittaqū al-laha wakūnū maʿa al-ṣādiqīna

mā kāna li-ahli al-madīnati waman ḥawlahum mina al-aʿrābi an yatakhallafū ʿan rasūli al-lahi walā yarghabū bi-anfusihim ʿan nafsihi dhālika bi-annahum lā yuṣībuhum ẓama-on walā naṣabun walā makhmaṣatun fī sabīli al-lahi walā yaṭaūna mawṭi-an yaghīẓu al-kufāra walā yanālūna min ʿaduwwin naylan illā kutiba lahum bihi ʿamalun ṣāliḥun inna al-laha lā yuḍīʿu ajra al-muḥ'sinīna
walā yunfiqūna nafaqatan ṣaghīratan walā kabīratan walā yaqṭaʿūna wādiyan illā kutiba lahum liyajziyahumu al-lahu aḥsana mā kānū yaʿmalūna
wamā kāna al-mu'minūna liyanfirū kāffatan falawlā nafara min kulli fir'qatin min'hum ṭāifatun liyatafaqqahū fī al-dīni waliyundhirū qawmahum idhā rajaʿū ilayhim laʿallahum yaḥdharūna
yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū qātilū alladhīna yalūnakum mina al-kufāri walyajidū fīkum ghil'ẓatan wa-iʿ'lamū anna al-laha maʿa al-mutaqīna
wa-idhā mā unzilat sūratun famin'hum man yaqūlu ayyukum zādathu hādhihi īmānan fa-ammā alladhīna āmanū fazādathum īmānan wahum yastabshirūna
wa-ammā alladhīna fī qulūbihim maraḍun fazādathum rij'san ilā rij'sihim wamātū wahum kāfirūna
awalā yarawna annahum yuf'tanūna fī kulli ʿāmin marratan aw marratayni thumma lā yatūbūna walā hum yadhakkarūna
wa-idhā mā unzilat sūratun naẓara baʿḍuhum ilā baʿḍin hal yarākum min aḥadin thumma inṣarafū ṣarafa al-lahu qulūbahum bi-annahum qawmun lā yafqahūna
laqad jāakum rasūlun min anfusikum ʿazīzun ʿalayhi mā ʿanittum ḥarīṣun ʿalaykum bil-mu'minīna raūfun raḥīmun
fa-in tawallaw faqul ḥasbiya al-lahu lā ilāha illā huwa ʿalayhi tawakkaltu wahuwa rabbu al-ʿarshi al-ʿaẓīmi
